description:
With its clean, understated lines, this jacket will have you dodging Spring showers in style. The Antora has weather protection worthy of the backcountry, but a classic A-line silhouette that looks right at home in the city. Constructed from 100% recycled waterproof breathable fabric, this parka length raincoat will keep you dry even on the wettest days.

  • 2-layer waterproof breathable DryVent® shell is made from recycled nylon, fully seam-sealed, and is treated with a non-PFC DWR finish to shed rain and keep the jacket cleaner longer
  • Recycled polyester mesh lining helps with airflow
  • Adjustable hood
  • Zippered hand pockets
  • Front zipper has a storm flap that secures with hook-and-loops tabs, keeping the warm in and the wet out
  • Elasticised cuffs seal out bad weather
  • A-line silhouette leaves plenty of room to move
  • Drop-tail hem and parka length for coverage
  • Standard fit wears like it should, no surprises
name: The North Face Antora Parka - Women's
